name: Endless Chess (Squid-Tuber)
description:
Oh no! You made yourself tiny with a spell after experimenting with angry chess pieces, this can't end well. Good thing you brought your special die. 

Survive for as long as possible and upgrade your dice to defeat the chess pieces.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

And YES I am aware of all the bugs:

- You can throw your die out of the arena

- You keep your points even in the next round

- The knight piece can't kill you

Sorry I missed these but I didn't want to be late for the deadline.
